title: Pixel 4 XL keeps crashing/restarting randomly in apps
content:
I've had the phone for less than a week and it keeps randomly restarting on me. This is my second factory reset and I'm starting to get annoyed. Is this happening to anyone else?

There's a slight rattle when I tap the screen hard so I'm wondering if something is loose in there. 

The issue appears to happen when I'm in an app for a bit. The phone is a little warm to the touch so I'm wondering if it's overheating.
